casebody.data:
HAROLD FRIER AND MRS. JIM HOLDER v. STATE OF FLORIDA 32 So. (2nd) 431

June Term, 1947

November 4, 1947 Division B B. L. Solomon, for appellants. J. Tom Watson, Attorney General, and Reeves Bowen, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

Affirmed on authority of Carroll v. United States, 267 U.S. 132, 69 L. ed. 543, 45 Sup. Ct. 280, 39 A.L.R. 790.

THOMAS, C. J., BUFORD, ADAMS and BARNS, JJ., concur.
